column4: Hey. My friend is doing an installation of 10.04 on top of a Windows 7. After taking a long time booting etc it asks him for a username and password. No matter what we type in, it doesn't do anything.
have you installed already or just booting a live cd?
try username : ubuntu and blank password...
alright will try once he's done restarting.
it should not prompt for it in the first place...but if it does try that..
he's still starting up so will try once he's done.
